question: Where is Phuket City?
hints: Another City in the Country is Pattaya City
Capital of the Country is Bangkok
aboutAnswer:
Phuket City is a city in the south-east of Phuket island, Thailand. It is the capital of Phuket Province.
Phuket is one of the oldest cities in Thailand.
It was an important port on the west of the Malay Peninsula where Chinese immigrants first landed.
